棯字的基本解释

棯
rěn
一种枣树。

棯
shěn
古书上说的一种树。

棯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［rěn］
［《廣韻》如甚切，上寑，日。］
亦作“菍2”。
果木名。一种枣树。
[②]［shěn］
［《集韻》式荏切，上，書。］
木名。

棯字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　棯； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页534第14
【唐韻】如甚切【集韻】忍甚切，?音荏。【玉篇】果名。【爾雅·釋木】還味，棯棗。【疏】短味名棯棗。　又【集韻】式荏切。同㰂。木名。　又【類篇】奴店切，音念。義同。

棯字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
棯字的起名意思

一种枣树。古书上说的一种树。

棯
Basic explanation of words
棯
rěn
A kind of jujube tree.
棯
shěn
A kind of tree mentioned in ancient books.
棯
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [rěn]
["Guangyun" Ru Shiqie, Shangyu, Japan. ]
Also known as "菍 2".
Fruit tree name. A kind of jujube tree.
[②] [shěn]
["Jiyun" style 荏切, upper , book. ]
Wooden name.
棯
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　棯; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 534 14
[Tang Yun] Rushiqie [Jiyun] Tolerate Shiqie,? Sound. 【Jade articles】Fruit name. 【Erya·Shimu】Resume the flavor, and the jujube. 【Sparse】Short-flavored name "Zaozao".　[Jiyun] style 荏切. Same as 㰂. Wooden name.　[Classes] Slave shop cuts, Yinnian. The same meaning.
